      • getModuleSchemeById

        public ModuleScheme getModuleSchemeById​(String id)
        Get a ModuleScheme based on its Id. Only return ModuleSchemes the User is authenticated to see.
        Parameters:
        id - Id to search for
        Returns:
        found ModuleScheme with maching Id, null if none is found

      • getAllModuleSchemes

        public List<ModuleScheme> getAllModuleSchemes()
        Get all ModuleSchemes the User is authenticated to see.
        Returns:
        list of al module schemes

      • getInstitutes

        public Set<Institute> getInstitutes​(ModuleScheme moduleScheme)
        Get the Institutes asociated with a ModuleScheme as a Set. This method is neccesairy because in a ModuleScheme instance only the Institute Ids are referenced.
        Parameters:
        moduleScheme - module scheme
        Returns:
        Set of Institute instances asociated with ModuleScheme

      • setInstitutes

        public void setInstitutes​(ModuleScheme moduleScheme,
                          Set<Institute> institutes)
        Set the Institutes asociated with a ModuleScheme. This method is neccesairy because in a ModuleScheme instance only the Institute Ids are referenced.
        Parameters:
        moduleScheme - module scheme
        institutes - Set of Institute instances asociated with ModuleScheme

      • getHasAccess

        public Set<User> getHasAccess​(ModuleScheme moduleScheme)
        Get the Users which have access to a ModuleScheme as a Set. This method is neccesairy because in a ModuleScheme instance only the User Ids are referenced.
        Parameters:
        moduleScheme - module scheme
        Returns:
        Set of User instances that have access to the ModuleScheme

      • setHasAccess

        Parameters:

        hasAccessSet - Set of User instances that have access to the ModuleScheme
